Grootegeluk Coal Mine is located in the Waterberg Coalfield of Limpopo province, South Africa, approximately 25 km west of Lephalale. Web search geocoded. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grootegeluk_Coal_Mine. The Grootegeluk coal mine is a significant coal mining operation in South Africa, known for its large reserves and production capacity

web_search_companies.notes: Exxaro Coal is a wholly owned subsidiary of Exxaro Resources Ltd, which is the primary owner and operator of the Grootegeluk coal mine.
